title: To Fight or Not To Fight
description:
A fight breaks out at the Nuggets vs. Suns game between fans which leads Jay and Christine to remember almost getting into a brawl at the movies.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
